APP_ID.name: Application ID
APP_ID.description: A unique identifier for the application that generated this log entry.

Timestamp.name: Timestamp
Timestamp.description: The time at which the log entry was generated.

LogLevel.name: Log Level
LogLevel.description: The severity level of the log message.

SourceComponent.name: Source Component
SourceComponent.description: The name of the component that generated the log entry.

TraceID.name: Trace ID
TraceID.description: A unique identifier for the trace that contains this log entry.
